long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Adysis Ad reporter allows site owners , publishers and users of the Adysis services to report adverts which conflict with their site policies.

The Adysis Ad Reporter allows Adysis users to highlight adverts on their website and easily click the advert to send a report to The Adysis Support Team, so as blocking the advert can take place.
